# Protocol
- [ ] Add 2 $/mu$l of RNA sample to a 0.5ml vial
- [ ] Add 16 $/mu$l of sigma water

** aim for 100ng of RNA per 1$/mu$l primer **

- [ ] Add 1 $/mu$l of oligo dT primer
- [ ] Incubate at 70C for 5 minutes using Peltier Thermal Cycler (PTC-200)
